questions.question: 1. What is your observation when the electrode distance is kept far in the simulator ?

answers.b: Higher resistance to transfer of electrons and protons
answers.c: Higher resistance to transfer of protons only
answers.d: Higher resistance to transfer of electrons only

questions.question: 2. What is your observation, when the biofilm formation is kept medium in the simulator ?

answers.b: Electrons and protons move at a faster rate
answers.c: Electrons and protons move at a slower rate
answers.d: The movement of electrons and protons is not visualized

questions.question: 3. From the simulator, what do you think is the relation between the surface area of electrodes and the performance efficiency of MFC ?

answers.a: Surface area of electrodes is directly related to the performance efficiency of MFC
answers.b: The surface area of electrodes is inversely related to the performance efficiency of MFC
answers.c: No relation between the surface area of electrodes and the performance efficiency of MFC
answers.d: Surface area is an independent factor in MFC

questions.question: 4. Which of the following parameters contribute to the better performance of an MFC ?

answers.a: The lower surface area of electrodes, medium biofilm formation, and positioning of electrodes closer
answers.b: The higher surface area of electrodes, low biofilm formation, and positioning of electrodes nearer
answers.c: The higher surface area of electrodes, high biofilm formation, and positioning of electrodes farthest
answers.d: The lower surface area of electrodes, high biofilm formation, positioning of electrodes nearer

questions.question: 5. Which of the following(s) contributes to greater impedance to the MFC in the simulator ?

answers.b: The lower surface area of the electrodes
